name: src/config.js

types: {"port": number, "entry": string, "demo": string, "docs": string, "bowerPath": string, "nodeModulesPath": string, "index": *}

name: require
description:
wrapper around cjs require
try's to read file from current working directory

params.name: name
params.description: the name of the element, component, etc

name: src/logger.js
src/server.js

params.name: config.entry
params.description: path to where your build is located

params.name: config.docs
params.description: path to where your docs are located

params.name: config.index
params.description: path to your index.html file we serve a helper/docs index by default (not support for now)

params.name: config.use
params.description: static files to include [{path: some/path, static: some//path}] when static is undefined path will be used.

params.name: disableAlternate
params.description: current working directory is ignored when true, defaults to false

name: src/utils.js
src/watcher.js
src/workers/watcher-worker.js
